rules_text: Draw two cards. If three or more colors of mana were spent to cast Planeswalker's Insight, draw three cards instead.
flavor_text:
[i]“Animus Vox, the music of the universe, has been turned from a joyous song into elegy. The Abominations' butchery of the Precursors has tainted it.”
—Glitch, Galactic Muse[/i]
